title: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, the JDBC Data Set Editor loads all tables and columns in the data source immediately upon loading the page.
EB: The load of the tree should be deferred until the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query. 2. Observe that all tables and columns in the data source are loaded immediately.
